code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GeneralContext}from'../context/GeneralContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setAuthType}=_ref;const{setEmail,setPassword,login}=useContext(GeneralContext);const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await login();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"authForm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-floating mb-3 authFormInputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"form-control",id:"floatingInput",placeholder:"name@example.com",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"floatingInput",children:"Email address"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-floating mb-3 authFormInputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"form-control",id:"floatingPassword",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"floatingPassword",children:"Password"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleLogin,children:"Sign in"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Not registered?
